tool_description: Unlock a world of knowledge with our powerful book retrieval API. Discover a vast collection of books from various genres.
name: BookPi
title: BookPi

api_list.name: Add a Book
api_list.description: This Endpoint Provides You with the Capability to Insert a New Book into the Database with All the Relevant Details.

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.default: Valis is a 1981 science fiction novel by American writer Philip K. Dick, intended to be the first book of a three-part series. The title is an acronym for Vast Active Living Intelligence System, Dick's gnostic vision of God
